Friend's Homestead

Pen and inkwash drawing of a scene from Dighton, MA.

  • Written: Aug 13, 2025

Two small scenes from a friendâ€™s porch in mass this weekend. The star of the show here, apparently, are house plants. One seemingly leafless and stick-y, another with exaggerated leaves, clearly an out-of-towner.

The family was out for a few hours and I was home with the dogs, so for this one I actually sat and drew what I saw, as opposed to drawing from a photo.
